alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 6:02AM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Total snowfall accumulations ranging from 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Tavaputs Plateau. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
